text: Kandi ntimuzagire indahiro zanyu uburyo bwo kuriganya hagati yanyu, bityo ikirenge (cyanyu) kitazavaho kikanyerera (kiva muri Isilamu) nyuma yâ€™uko cyari gishikamye (mu kwemera), maze mugasogongera ikibi (ibihano byo ku isi) kubera ko mwakumiriye (abantu) kugana inzira ya Allah, ndetse mukazahanishwa ibihano bihambaye
